verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%>. The <S%H410>mighty<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, even the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> from the <S%H4217>rising<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun<s%> unto the going <S%H3996>down<s%> thereof.
Out of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, the <S%H4359>perfection<s%> of <S%H3308>beauty<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H3313>shined<s%>.

Our <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%>, and shall not keep <S%H2790>silence<s%>: a <S%H784>fire<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, and it shall be <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H8175>tempestuous<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> him.
He shall <S%H7121>call<s%> to the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> from <S%H5920>above<s%>, and to the <S%H776>earth<s%>, that he may <S%H1777>judge<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>.
<S%H622>Gather<s%> my <S%H2623>saints<s%> together unto me; those that have <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with me by <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>.
And the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> his <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>: for <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H8199>judge<s%> himself. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
<S%H8085>Hear<s%>, O my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and I will <S%H1696>speak<s%>; O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and I will <S%H5749>testify<s%> against thee: I am <S%H430>God<s%>, even thy <S%H430>God<s%>.
I will not <S%H3198>reprove<s%> thee for thy <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> or thy burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%>, to have been <S%H8548>continually<s%> before me.
I will <S%H3947>take<s%> no <S%H6499>bullock<s%> out of thy <S%H1004>house<s%>, nor he <S%H6260>goats<s%> out of thy <S%H4356>folds<s%>.
For every <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%> is mine, and the <S%H929>cattle<s%> upon a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2042>hills<s%>.
I <S%H3045>know<s%> all the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>: and the wild <S%H2123>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> are <S%H5978>mine<s%>.
If I were <S%H7456>hungry<s%>, I would not <S%H559>tell<s%> thee: for the <S%H8398>world<s%> is mine, and the <S%H4393>fulness<s%> thereof.
Will I <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of <S%H47>bulls<s%>, or <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H6260>goats<s%>?
<S%H2076>Offer<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%>; and <S%H7999>pay<s%> thy <S%H5088>vows<s%> unto the most <S%H5945>High<s%>:
And <S%H7121>call<s%> upon me in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%>: I will <S%H2502>deliver<s%> thee, and thou shalt <S%H3513>glorify<s%> me.

But unto the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%>, What hast thou to do to <S%H5608>declare<s%> my <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, or that thou shouldest <S%H5375>take<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> in thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>?
Seeing thou <S%H8130>hatest<s%> <S%H4148>instruction<s%>, and <S%H7993>castest<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> thee.
When thou <S%H7200>sawest<s%> a <S%H1590>thief<s%>, then thou <S%H7521>consentedst<s%> with him, and hast been <S%H2506>partaker<s%> with <S%H5003>adulterers<s%>.
Thou <S%H7971>givest<s%> thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and thy <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H6775>frameth<s%> <S%H4820>deceit<s%>.
Thou <S%H3427>sittest<s%> and <S%H1696>speakest<s%> against thy <S%H251>brother<s%>; <S%H5414>thou<s%> <S%H1848>slanderest<s%> thine own <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>.

These things hast thou <S%H6213>done<s%>, and I kept <S%H2790>silence<s%>; thou <S%H1819>thoughtest<s%> that I was <S%H1961>altogether<s%> such an one as thyself: but I will <S%H3198>reprove<s%> thee, and set them in <S%H6186>order<s%> before thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.
Now <S%H995>consider<s%> this, ye that <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H433>God<s%>, lest I tear you in <S%H2963>pieces<s%>, and there be none to <S%H5337>deliver<s%>.

Whoso <S%H2076>offereth<s%> <S%H8426>praise<s%> <S%H3513>glorifieth<s%> me: and to him that <S%H7760>ordereth<s%> his <S%H1870>conversation<s%> aright will I <S%H7200>shew<s%> the <S%H3468>salvation<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.
